properties.entry: insert into ui_page(page_id, page_nm, page_desc) values (:id, :nm, :desc)

insert into ui_elements(page_id, element_id, selector_text, class_names, ctnt_text, pos_left, pos_top, ui_width, ui_height, major_yn) values (:pageId, :id, :selector, :classNames, :text, :left, :top, :width, :height, :majorYn)
select page_id, page_nm, page_desc from ui_page order by page_id asc
select page_id , element_id , selector_text , class_names , ctnt_text , pos_left , pos_top , ui_width , ui_height , major_yn from ui_elements where page_id = :pageId order by element_id asc
select page_id , element_id , selector_text , class_names , ctnt_text , pos_left , pos_top , ui_width , ui_height , major_yn from ui_elements where page_id = :pageId and element_id = :elementId
update edmc_property set prop_value = :propValue where prop_type = :propType and prop_nm = :propNm
